actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to allow a retired employee or Member who, upon remarriage, elects to have his spouse receive a survivor annuity to increase the amount of such annuity over the amount of the survivor annuity elected for his previous spouse.

summary.text: Allows a retired Federal employee or Member of Congress who elected to provide a survivor annuity to his or her spouse, to increase the amount of such annuity for a spouse of a remarriage.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to allow a retired employee or Member who, upon remarriage, elects to have his spouse receive a survivor annuity to increase the amount of such annuity over the amount of the survivor annuity elected for his previous spouse.
